DSC

This control panel has a 15” Color Siemens touch screen, it controls the world’s largest vacuum floor “M-Section, Waffle Cone” Blast Booth.  This panel constantly monitors Vacuum pressure, and pressure drops across the various filter sections in the system, it sequences an array of 9 valves, and controls the whole media recovery system.  It allows the user to choose and make custom floor vacuum sequences to match the product that is being blasted.  It also has the entire user manual with drawings and pictures built into the touch panel.  This allows the user to look up how to operate and troubleshoot the panel quickly.  This panel also has a modem to allow AFC to dial in and facilitate troubleshooting without having to be onsite.

(800) 331-7744

Speak with an AFC representative today. Get a free quote on your own custom industrial control solution.
